title: Deal of the Day: Bare Minerals' Complexion Rescue Gel-Cream
text:
We read Ashley Weatherford’s very compelling review of Bare Minerals’ Complexion Rescue tinted-gel-cream hybrid back in 2015 (she had us at the headline: “This Face Cream Gives You Instagram-Ready Skin”), and swiftly ordered ourselves a tube. We were heartened to see that what Weatherford claimed was true: “The coverage isn’t particularly heavy, but that’s also what makes the cream so special. It hides imperfections while still making your skin look like skin,” she wrote. Now’s a particularly good time to partake in the joys of this face cream, which Weatherford also described as “a Valentine’s Day present to my face,” as it (and all Bare Minerals products) is 25 percent off at Dermstore. Note that it comes in a wide array of shades, including opal , buttercream , suede , chestnut , and sienna .
Original Price: $30
